content.rendered:
Our auto salvage yard has an enormous supply of used auto parts that fit most vehicle makes and models. Our yard spans many acres and has a huge selection of cars, including Nissan, Honda, Mazda, Toyota, Ford, Jeep, and many more. Our unmatched service includes consultations with our knowledgeable and friendly staff who will help you find the parts you need! Whether you are rebuilding an engine or replacing a radiator, our expert staff will help you get the rights parts and tools to get the job done.

If used parts are not what you’re looking for, take a look at our wholesale parts, and junk cars. We stand behind all our products and services so you can rest assured that our parts are up to industry standards and will be functional in your vehicle. Our goal is to provide our customers with affordable prices, honest and respectful service, and the best selection of quality parts.

Save money without sacrificing dependability.

At Aero Auto Parts we take great care to comprehensively evaluate our parts and make sure they are fit to be put into another vehicle. Check out our inventory of used parts at and see just how much money you could save. Maintain your car’s appearance and function and replace bad parts with affordable used auto parts in Chicago. Our skilled team of technicians vets each auto part before it is passed onto its new owner to make sure it is in good condition and will perform appropriately. Your vehicles safety and function are extremely important to us, which is why we make sure to sell only the best parts. At Aero Auto Parts we stand behind the quality of our products and services.

Need to find a door for a red ’91 Hyundai Scoupe?

Most people probably don’t believe that’s even a real car, but if there’s a red door for one out there, your best bet for finding it is in our huge selection of car body parts.

Used Auto Parts Chicago

Used parts at the best prices in Chicago:

  • Engines
  • Motors
  • Alternatorsu
  • Batteries
  • Tires
  • Body Parts
  • Doors
  • Headlights
  • Taillights
  • Transmissions
  • Rotors
  • Calipers
  • Starters
  • Radiators
  • Bumpers
  • Steering Columns

Looking to save a little money on your car repairs? Call Aero Auto Parts today at 773-483-2626 or come down to 6339 S. Wentworth Ave and check out our selection of used auto parts Chicago, for all makes and models, all at the best prices in town.
